subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: While in the lead of Saturday night’s Sprint Cup race at Bristol Motor Speedway in Tennessee, Denny Hamlin had his car clipped by Kevin Harvick, sending it into the wall. Hamlin appeared to adhere to a new Nascar rule that requires drivers to stay in their cars
